p: The viability of CET-treated Vero cells was determined using a CCK-8 assay, and a comparison of the results with a control group revealed that CET possesses mild cytotoxicity. The CC 50 of CET though was found to be more than 300 μM ( Fig. 2 A); however, as CET is an FDA-approved drug, we were not concerned with a lack of safety.
